item.description: We are meeting on Jan.1st.Maybe it will be an intimate little group,maybe it will be one or two of us teaching the waitstaff about real estate and foreclosures or whatever.I hope someone comes forward to help with the "South Shore" RE Meetup soon.I have had some interest,both attendees and possible assts./co-organizers.I want to hear from you,post something to the message board,let's open up this discussion.thanx,dale
item.name: Greater Boston REal Estate Investors Club/Meetup
